analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/43/0x8cb9c15f68a052955276e84e86e2a9d9a72e2d0a.sol:
	Contract GRUCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/43/0x8cb9c15f68a052955276e84e86e2a9d9a72e2d0a.sol#217)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/43/0x8cb9c15f68a052955276e84e86e2a9d9a72e2d0a.sol#87) is not in mixedCase
